page.title: 13DEVIZES HOSPITAL MANAGEMENT.
page.content: An interview with the Administrator of Roundway hospital in Devizes. The Hospital was built in 1851 and it now has 20 wards and there are 525 patients. There are 138 acres of land belonging to the hospital, which is less than it used to be because they have sold off a lot of it.There are 386 nurses in the hospital but they all do different jobs. There are 86 cleaners and there are 32 doctors. The Hospital deals with Psychiatric patients from the age of sixteen years upward and it costs Â£6,500,000 a year to run. Sometimes the patients get bad tempered but the doctors, nurses or sisters calm them down. The biggest ward has 36 beds. Mr.Coles was 44 when he started work in 1975.
